A smart tissue box that can detect when you're about to blow your nose and automatically dispenses a tissue, while also playing a soothing sound to help calm your nasal passages.
A tissue box with a built-in air purifier that removes allergens and pollutants from the air, providing a healthier breathing experience.
A tissue box with a hidden compartment that stores small items like coins, keys, or jewelry, keeping them organized and out of sight.
A tissue box that doubles as a mini-terrarium, complete with a small plant and a self-watering system, bringing a touch of greenery to your desk or shelf.
A tissue box with a built-in LED light that changes colors to match your mood, providing a fun and interactive way to brighten up your day.
